name: Gundam Wing : Endless Waltz Quiz | G | 20 Questions

questions.text: Whose idea was it to send the Gundams into the sun?
EZ: How many sisters does Quatre have?
questions.explanation:
29.

	28 are test tube babies, just like ALL the Maganacs!

questions.text: Who tries to destroy their Gundam before Operation Meteor?
EZ: Where was Duo raised?
EZ: Who raised him?
Which pilot was originally just a mechanic?
questions.explanation:
Trowa.

	He got the Gundam when another mechanic killed the real Trowa Barton.

questions.text: EZ: Who is Trowa's sister?
questions.explanation:
Catherine.

	They were seperated durning an OZ attack.

questions.text: Whose Gundam doesn't appear in his flashback?
EZ: What is Heero's real name?
questions.explanation:
Odin Lowe Jr.

	He was raised by Odin Lowe, the assain who killed the real Heero Yuy!

questions.text: Which pilot doesn't send his Gundam to Quatre and Duo?
EZ: Who is Wu Fei's wife?
questions.explanation:
Meiran.

	She was the first to pilot the Tallgeese.

questions.text: Who is Treize's daughter?
Who fight's Duo during the infiltration?
questions.correct: trowa & Trowa & Trowa Barton & trowa barton
questions.explanation: trowa & Trowa & Trowa Barton & trowa barton.

questions.text: Who fights Heero?
Which pilot does Duo say will soon 'blame his lazyness for the lack of oxygen in space'?
Who manipulates Mariemaia?
Who 'picks up' Zechs in outer space?
How many soiders do Zechs, Lucrezia, Quatre, Trowa, and Duo kill in the last battle?
EZ: What does the girl give to Trowa?
questions.explanation:
a cross.

	It's actually a bug.

questions.text: The Tough One : Who is talking to Dr. J during Heero's flashback?
